Class Image

java.lang.Object
Image
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Image
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
Class that converts any image on disk into a BufferedImage, allowing it to me modified with the given tools.
Since:
10-14-2020
Version:
0.2
Author:
Zeyu Su
See Also:
Serialized Form

      Returns:

      width - the scale of width user want to stretch to

      Change the image into single color based on the user's choice
      Parameters:
      R - the red value for the color of the image
      G - the green value for the color of the image
      B - the blue value for the color of the image

      java.lang.Exception
